flawed_nl_solution:
In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 12 months/year) * 2 years = $10200
When Liam pays his bills, he will have $10200 - $3500 = $<<10200-3500=6700>>6700 left
#### 6700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 10200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
